name: Magplat
description:
(If you're having lag issues, check this article)

MAGPLAT is an indie minimalist 2D platformer where you use magnetic forces to perform challenging acrobatics and overcome puzzles.

The game is currently in development and so far there are 20 levels in which you use attraction forces to move. If enough people are interested I'll keep working on it, adding more levels with mechanics such as repulsion forces, moving magnets and, spikes that kill you on touch.

Show your support and interest by donating or subscribing to get updates.
